verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:3
verses.text: Now the name of the man was Nabal; and the name of his wife Abigail: and she was a woman of good understanding, and of a beautiful countenance: but the man was churlish and evil in his doings; and he was of the house of Caleb.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:4
verses.text: And David heard in the wilderness that Nabal did shear his sheep.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:5
verses.text: And David sent out ten young men, and David said unto the young men, Get you up to Carmel, and go to Nabal, and greet him in my name:
